scripts.clean:webapp: rimraf apps/webapp/node_modules apps/webapp/.turbo apps/webapp/dist apps/webapp/package-lock.json apps/webapp/pnpm-lock.json apps/webapp/.next
scripts.clean:style-shelf: rimraf packages/style-shelf/node_modules packages/style-shelf/.turbo packages/style-shelf/dist packages/style-shelf/package-lock.json packages/style-shelf/pnpm-lock.json
scripts.clean:label-shelf: rimraf packages/label-shelf/node_modules packages/label-shelf/.turbo packages/label-shelf/dist packages/label-shelf/package-lock.json packages/label-shelf/pnpm-lock.json
scripts.clean:orm-shelf: rimraf packages/orm-shelf/node_modules packages/orm-shelf/.turbo packages/orm-shelf/dist packages/orm-shelf/package-lock.json packages/orm-shelf/pnpm-lock.json
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:webapp && pnpm run clean:style-shelf && pnpm run clean:component-shelf && pnpm run clean:label-shelf && pnpm run clean:orm-shelf && pnpm run clean:root
